column1: 128kph, good length, shape back into Wade and he checks his drive back to the bowler
beaten driving at a 130kph away swinger. Great skill to shape it the other way late and Wade was beaten all ends up

attempted ramp, he gets a top edge over slip! Another away swinger that swerved wide as Wade stepped outside off to paddle scoop over fine leg, got a top edge off the toe of the bat and flies safe over slip
a leave! Wade was unsure of the swing, it was a good length 136kph, wide of off, hint of shape back and he watches it go past
cracking pull shot! Fractionally short and he transferred the weight back quickly and crunched it forward of square. Good shot
steps outside off, and paddle flicks it in the air behind square and it lands short of the deep backward square
another superb pull shot! 98kph, but too short, he was sitting back and pulling with control infront of square
shorter outside off, he gives room and cuts hard to deep point
shorter length, 99kph, it shoots a touch low as he pulls and gets a bottom edge onto pad
a miscue to mid off! Back of a length on off, he went back and tried to flat back it over mid off but he completely miscued and lobbed a catch to Pandya on the circle at mid off. Simple catch
100kph, good length fired into middle, he's back and taken high on the pad, Sundar appeals but it's given not out. They don't review
back of a length, 104kph, angled into leg, he backs away and mistimes to cover
113kph, slower ball, shaping in a touch, he clips this neatly straight to midwicket
back of a length, he's squared up trying to work to leg, gets a leading edge and it goes through cover-point
fuller on off, he drives but straight to mid off
play and miss trying to cut a ball too close to him. This wasn't that short and it shapes back a touch and he was cramped
118kph, shorter ball, slower, it holds in the surface, he controls a pull shot to deep forward square
beaten by a beautiful outswinger. Full and wide, tempting the drive, Smith was tempted but it shaped very late past the edge
fired down leg and it missed by Rahul! It runs away for five wides!
short down leg, he just helps it on its way behind square! Easy pull shot to the short boundary. It's only 61m to that side
exposes his stumps to a length ball on middle and cuts straight to cover-point
fuller, darted into leg, he gives room again and gets a thick bottom edge onto pad
back of a length outside off, he cuts firmly straight to cover-point
shorter length, he stands up and punches a back foot drive to mid on on the circle
he's hit on the pad sweeping but it pitched way outside leg, they pinch a leg bye
short outside off, knuckle ball and it sits up, Wade thumps a pull shot through midwicket! Just missed with his length Chahar
carved over cover! Great shot. A better length but too wide and he leaned back and thrashed it over cover with power
short bouncer that gets away from him and it's way too wide and short
115kph, back of a length angled into off, he's cramped for room and he pushes this to cover
Smith is on the walk, it's dug in at 117kph, he flicks this behind square, straight to the man in the deep
131kph, yorker, he gets a thick inside edge just past leg stump, fine leg is up and they get three
135kph, back of a length wide of off, he places an excellent back foot drive through cover and it races away on the outfield, Kohli just hauls it in
127kph, back of a length outside off, he mistimes off the back foot to cover
132kph, back of a length, on off, he forces back to the bowler
126kph, cutter on off, he whips from off stump behind square
130kph yorker, right on the money, he just digs this out to mid on
135kph, good length on off, he's back and driving off the back foot, working it wide of mid on, amazing skill and placement but it's the long boundary so they only get three
132kph, low full toss, he drives to mid off on the circle
90kph, full on off, he drives slowly to the circle at mid on, long on is back and they run brilliantly to pinch two
full outside leg, he sweeps along the ground to deep backward square
92kph, good length, sliding into leg, he works this to midwicket but they can't pinch two this time
81kph, wrong un, shorter on leg, he works this off the hip through square leg
94kph, full on leg, he advances and drives to long on
88kph, leg break outside off, Wade uses the wrists and weights his shot to the circle at midwicket and calls two immediately. Good batting
short outside off, he cuts hard in the air to deep backward point on the bounce
102kph, short and wide, he cuts hard to deep point
tossed up slower, he chips his shot towards long off but they only get one
superb pull shot between midwicket and long on! A touch too short, he was back and slapping this with power to the short boundary
102kph, he tries to slog sweep a full ball, gets a thick inside edge behind square
fired into leg, 99kph, he backs away and mistimes a drive to cover
91kph, full on leg, he drives to long on
88kph, short wrong un on leg, he checks a pull shot to deep square
91kph, full on middle, he slog sweeps to deep midwicket
full outside off, he drives firmly to cover
wrong un outside leg, he mistimes a sweep straight to short fine leg
advances and it drifts into Smith late and he drives to long on
missed stumping! Smith charged to a 102kph length ball and ran straight past it trying to hit inside out over cover, he was going to walk off and Rahul fumbled badly, he was able to get back
sliced inside out over backward point! That is salt into the wound. Smith gets a life and punishes the next one
full on leg, he dances down and works this to the gap at midwicket

clean bowled! Rahul is relieved! Lovely delivery. Tossed higher and slower outside off, Smith gives room to try and loft to the short boundary at cover, he is deceived in flight and it clips the top of off.
full on leg, 101kph, he pushes a drive to wide long on and they run really well for a couple
87kph, tossed up outside off, he works this to midwicket with all the men back and wants two but Sundar races across to track it down
whippy offcutter, on a length on leg stump, Maxwell can only jab it back to Natarajan
Natarajan gets his pace up to 131ks, hits a heavy length and attacks the stumps, punched past him for one
there comes the lifter from Natarajan, but it's too high, and called a wide as it sails through to Rahul
pitched up and angling into middle, Wade tips it to the leg side, towards the midwicket region, and hares back for the second. Back-to-back fifties for Wade

pretty full, Natarajan brings this one back into Wade, this is something he has been working on in the recent years, has Wade falling over the flick. Hits the front pad. Not given out lbw. Has that straightened enough to attack leg stump? India call for a review. Or have India been timed out? Looks like, and Kohli has a word with the umpire. And guess what? The tracker returns three reds
low full-toss, sliding into the pads, picked off to deep midwicket
mighty full on middle, not quite a yorker, Maxwell stabs it out to cover
good length = bad length. Length ball on off, Wade opens up his hips and disdainfully swats it over the midwicket fence
shorter and outside off, Wade leans back and punches up to sweeper cover
Thakur hits a heavy length, short and swerving down the leg side. Maxwell, having shuffled across off, does not touch it
Maxwell backs away, Thakur digs it shorter and outside off, slower variation, chops it down to deep third man. Good work in the outfield from Natarajan
on-pace length ball, angling into the pads, Maxwell knows fine leg is inside the circle, so he simply flips it over that fielder and picks up four
back of a length and on the hips, whipped away to deep square leg
dangled up and wide, off-side wide, left alone
short and on a fifth-stump line, not much turn, slapped off the back foot to the off-side sweeper
shorter and skidding across off, possibly a wrong'un, but too short anyway, carved to sweeper cover off the back foot
Maxwell brings out the reverse-hit. Maxwell jumps across, Chahal pushes it wide of off, swats it over backward point for four
and the reverse-hit again. Maxwell does not connect well, but gets enough bat onto it to clear Natarajan over short fine leg
looks like a wrong'un, on a length, dropped to cover for one

Rahul makes no mistake this time as he tracks down this skier. Chahal shifts his line wider once again, hits a heavy length. Maxwell aims to haul it over midwicket. He can only top-edge it to Rahul. Okay, hang on, Chahal has overstepped
wide yorker, stabbed out to cover
full and outside off, punched down to long-off
knuckle ball variation from Thakur, Maxwell slices his lofted drive, Samson is lurking at long-off. He leaps to his left, chucks the ball into play, before going over the ropes
Thakur is also showing off his variety here. Off-stump yorker, jammed out
slower ball, short and outside off at 101ks, Maxwell reverse-swats it to deep point. Another knuckle ball from Thakur
Thankur ventures an offcutter, puts it on a length and outside off. Wade picks it up, opens up his hips and hauls it over wide long-on. Muscled away
slower short ball outside off, plinked to the covers off the back foot
tossed outside off, Maxwell drops down to one knee and slog-sweeps on the bounce to deep midwicket
heavy length outside off, Wade sits back and stabs it away to the leg side
Maxwell shows his ace a bit early, he nips down the track, Chahal holds this legbreak back and shifts his line much wider. Maxwell still fetches it and scoops it over long-on for six
off-wide wide
Chahal loses his line again, another off-side wide
Maxwell jumps across off stump, he keeps flitting around his crease, makes Chahal bowl shorter into him. Clubs it over the shorter leg-side boundary for another six

Rahul belts out an appeal for caught behind. Not given out. Chahal isn't convinced, but India still go for a review and they take it on time. Maxwell aims for a reverse-sweep, darted flatter and wider of off. Nothing on Hotspot. No spike on Snicko either. The original decision is upheld
pitched up and just a shade outside off, drilled to extra-cover
looks like a knuckle ball outside off, Maxwell can't quite connect with a reverse-dab
on a length and sliding in at off stump, Maxwell swings for the hills but can only get the ball as far as deep midwicket
Chahar goes for the wide yorker, comes out as a full-toss, which is jabbed down to long-off
slower short ball outside off, sits up, Wade slugs it flat and hard to deep midwicket
full-toss on off stump, forced down to long-off. Chahar ends with 0 for 34 in his first over

Thakur thinks he has Maxwell caught behind. With one second to go, Kohli calls for the review. Maxwell searches for the reverse-hit, this is the slower variation from Thakur - possibly a knuckle ball. No bat involved once again. Maxwell is good to go
back of a length and wider, Maxwell reaches out and scythes it wide of Iyer at sweeper
full and straight, whipped to Chahar at deep midwicket
on a length and on off stump, offcutter, nurdled through the leg side
Chahar runs in from sweeper cover and drops it! Sloppy stuff from India. Full and outside off, Maxwell aims to launch it over extra-cover, instead he slices it squarer. Chahar runs in and spills it
Whoa! Outrageous strike from Maxwell. This is a slower length ball outside off, Maxwell jumps across off, manufactures his own pace and smites it over the midwicket boundary - like only he can
full-toss outside off, driven wide of long-off, they sprint back for the third
slower offcutter from Natarajan, sucks pace off it, Maxwell reverse-scoops early and misses
low full-toss on off, jabbed to extra-cover, where Dhawan fumbles
wide yorker from Natarajan, but too wide, hence called off-side wide
another wide yorker from Natarajan, he's so good with this, stabbed to cover
Natarajan searches for the yorker, misses his mark by a bit, Maxwell sits so very deep in the crease and shovels it away to the midwicket fence to reach his fifty off 31 balls
on a length and outside off, offcutter, swished to sweeper cover
fullish and outside off, cross-seam, Maxwell jumps across off, aims for the shorter leg-side fence, leading-edges it down to third man instead

slower dipper from Thakur and Wade has been given out lbw. The batsman sweeps early, the ball plunges sharply and hits him on the boot in line with the stumps. Wade has reviewed almost immediately. Has he nicked it then? Nope, and ball-tracking returns three reads. Wade goes for a career-best 80 off 53 balls
cross-seamer, 113ks, steps out and carves to sweeper cover. Washington runs in, but the ball carroms away from him into the fence
shorter and outside off, pulled to deep midwicket
another 119ks slower ball, away from the batsman's reach, beaten
wide yorker, Maxwell jumps across off, aims for the short leg-side boundary, but can only jam it down to short third man, where Chahal drops another regulation chance

Natarajan aims for the yorker, but it comes out as a full-toss. Maxwell shuffles across, looks to reverse-swat it away, but misses it altogether in the end. Natarajan messes with the stumps once again
Short shuffles across and gives the left-armer the charge, Natarajan shifts his lines wider, sliced to deep third man
full and outside off, drilled through the line, placed to the right of sweeper cover as Samson slides in vain in the outfield

full-toss, but it is still a hard-to-hit full-toss, punched down towards long-on. Short comes back for the second - which isn't quite there - and is caught short despite a full-length dive. Nice, flat throw from the deep
Natarajan aims for the yorker, Sams, batting outside his crease, stretches out further and squeezes it through the covers for four
Sams backs away outside leg, Natarajan pulls his length back and shifts his line wider to beat the swinging bat
73kph, good length on off, he's back and pushing to cover

holes out to deep midwicket! 82kph, shorter length, Rahul pinned the ears back to hammer this over deep midwicket into the crowd and just didn't middle it, he hit it straight down Smith's throat and the Australians are delighted
89kph, shorter length, he stands up and swats this along the ground to deep long on
91kph, shorter outside off, some turn away, he checks a cut shot to cover on the circle
90kph length on leg, he tucks off the hip behind square
90kph arm ball, darted into leg, he defends with soft hands into the leg side for a single
130kph, back of a length wide of off, he pushes this to point and they take on Maxwell, his throw misses but Kohli was stretched
short, wide and swinging wider, Wade doves full length to knock it down but they get an extra run as it bounces away
135kph, back of a length on the hip, he's back and tucking this to square leg
130kph, back of a length, this climbs, Kohli does well controlling a guided late cut fine of third man. He got on top of the bounce
nearly a return catch! 133kph, back of a length, he tried to force down the ground and miscued just past the left hand of Abbott
Dhawan fakes to back away early, Abbott bowls a good length on middle, Dhawan drops it into the off side with soft hands
Kohli stays leg side trying to force through the off, he chops and thick inside edge that runs to a vacant fine leg for three
76kph tossed up on leg, Kohli plays for turn and gets a leading edge into the off side
fired down the leg side, Wade can't gather cleanly and they run an extra
Smith drops a sitter at deep midwicket! Wow! Tossed up, he advances and lofts this straight to Smith on the rope and he spilled it. Chest high. What is going on?
shorter outside off, he cuts to the gap at cover-point
shorter on leg, he clips this through midwicket
shorter outside off, it grips and bounces, he mistimes a checked pull to midwicket
87kph, full on leg, he works this off his pads through forward square
walks down the track and whips his dismissively up an over midwicket! Pure class, bordering on arrogance. What a shot.
length cutter across him, he cuts with a flourish to deep point
full on leg, 131kph, he works this with the angle to midwicket
126kph, bouncer, too high
130kph, short and wide, he hammers a hard cut to deep point
slower ball, beats Dhawan as he tries to sweep from outside off, it spins on the second bounce and kicks awkwardly for Wade and they pinch a bye as it bounces away
fuller outside off, he pushes to the gap in the off side
missed return catch! Too hot! Fuller length, on leg, he backs away and lofts it back to the bowler but it got onto Tye too quick and burst through his hands as he thrust them up
full on leg, he backs away and defends into the offside
fuller outside off, he checks a drives straight to mid off
cut up and over short third man! Bad ball with that field. Too short and wide, Kohli just upper cut with ease
126kph, angled into leg, he defends to midwicket
135kph, back of a length on off, he's back and defending behind point for a single
Kohli dashes down the track, manufactures a half-volley and belts it to the left of mid-off. Dismissive
pitched up and angling in at off, Kohli camps back, works it to midwicket and pilfers a single
good length and angling across off, Dhawan loses his shape as he slogs to the leg side. Instead, he slices an edge over slip for four
pitched up and outside off, Dhawan shuffles across off and whips it away to deep square leg
full and straight, it's Kohli's turn to shovel a single to deep square. 50 up for India
overpitched and outside off, Dhawan spanks it through the line. Driven straight of mid-off, between the bowler and Kohli for four
drags down a legbreak outside off, hauled down to long-on
dragged down outside off, smeared to sweeper cover
chopped from off stump to short third man. 'Smart bowling Sweppy' says Wade from behind the stumps and makes my job a whole lot easier
darted on middle and leg, Dhawan punches down to long-on
shorter and skids into the top of off, Kohli leans back and serenely drives to sweeper cover
skidding on outside off, Dhawan drags a pull through midwicket to make it six singles off the over
Dhawan gives Maxwell a taste of his own medicine. He rolls out a reverse-sweep and gets it past Finch at slip for four
here comes Dhawan: down the track, Maxwell goes shorter, hauled down to long-on for one
Kohli leaves his crease and works a non-turning offbreak to the right of Maxwell
patted down to long-on off the front foot
dug in short at the body, Dhawan rides the bounce and taps a single to deep midwicket off the back foot
uses his feet and works it through midwicket for one
Kohli dashes out, gets too close to the pitch of this delivery and drills it past the bowler
shorter and breaks away outside off, chopped to sweeper cover off the back foot
pushed down the ground for one more
skiddy legbreak, some extra bounce to boot, spliced in front of long-on

Sams grabs it on the second attempt and gives Swepson the breakthrough. Dragged down on off stump, Dhawan absolutely nails the pull but hits it towards deep midwicket, where Sams originally runs in, then leaps to his left. He somehow hangs onto the catch in the end
back of a length and spins away outside off, Kohli punches with the spin to sweeper cover
back of a length and around off stump, played back to Zampa
Kohli steps out. Zampa slows this up on middle, the batsman adjusts and knocks a single down to long-off
wrong'un, slides in on top of off, Samson hangs back and glides it square for one
back of a length and aiming for the stumps, Kohli's back-foot punch to long-on intervenes
shorter and outside off, Samson leans back and chops it to sweeper. There's an overthrow from Short in the deep, wild throw, bounces off the footmarks
looped on middle, hint of turn, Kohli respects it and dinks it to cover
wide of the crease, short and breaking away outside off, Kohli scythes it to sweeper cover off the back foot
jab and run to point
fired into the legs, lovely defensive bowling, squeezed down to long-on

Swepson spins around for an lbw appeal, umpire Tucker says no. Wrong'un, sliding in to beat the sweep, but probably heading down the leg side. Australia, though, belatedly go for a review. Not bat involved, Swepson hits the back leg in line with middle and leg. Ball-tracking suggests it would have spun past leg stump
excellent variation in pace from Swepson. Slower and spins away outside off, edged to short third man
tossed on middle, only driven as far as long-on. Another top over from Swepson
down the track comes Kohli, takes a full-toss, and carves to sweeper cover
back of a length and skidding in, Samson jumps back and forces it to the left of sweeper. Short throws himself to his left to chuck the ball into play
wrong'un, glanced off the pads behind square on the leg side
Kohli steps out, Zampa drags his length back outside off. Kohli checks his shot and pushes to sweeper cover
shorter and outside off, smeared to extra-cover off the back foot. Henriques makes a sprawling save
dinked in the gap at cover, and that's fifty for Kohli off 41 balls. It's time for him to kick into a higher gear
wide of the crease, Kohli steps out and bashes a full-toss to the left of long-off
speared into the legs, picked off to deep midwicket

Oh, Samson has mis-hit a full-toss straight to long-on. It's a dipping full-toss, plunges sharply on the batsman, making him lose his shape. Regulation take in the outfield and just reward for Swepson

Smith at the edge of the long-on boundary goes for the overhead catch, takes it and knocks it back into play before tumbling over the ropes. This was tossed up on middle, Kohli lofts it and gets away. Smith saves four runs for Australia. Great work from him
jabbed away into the leg side to the right of the bowler

Swepson's night gets better! Iyer has been given out lbw, he chats to his captain and asks for a review. Wrong'un from Swepson, Iyer inches forward and does not read it, pushing outside the line of it. Did he nick it? Nope, and it's clipping top of leg stump. Swepson finishes with 3 for 23 in four overs. Will it turn out to be a match-winning spell?
opens the face and guides it to short third man
on a length and outside off, sticks in the pitch a touch, chipped to mid-on
looks like a legcutter from Abbott, Pandya is beaten for the lack of pace as the ball floats past outside edge
another slower ball on middle, chipped into the leg side
Kohli shuffles across off, then gets in line with a length ball on off stump and hoists it over mid-off. Languid lofted drive for the first boundary since the 8th over
hip-high short ball, angling into the body, Kohli is back, pulling to deep midwicket
slower ball, floats away outside off, left alone
Kohli jumps across off, Tye goes shorter and wider, dragged away into the leg side as Kohli can't connect well enough with a pull
dipping full-toss outside off, Pandya swishes, but the ball sneaks underneath his swing
on a length and outside off, another of those cutters, sliced in front of sweeper
dug in short and wide outside off, some tennis-ball bounce for Tye. Kohli searches for it and does not get bat on ball
back of a length and wobbles away outside off as Tye keeps the ball away from a moving Kohli's reach
128kph, back of a length and it kicks up and hits the sticker of the bat, he pushes it into the off side
launched over the long boundary at deep midwicket! Length ball in the slot and with the bottom hand he flushed it over midwicket! That was out of the screws
top edge for six over fine leg! Short into the ribs, he pull awkwardly as it cramped him, it came off the top edge and flew all the way over the rope at fine leg
133kph, length ball into the hip, he clips this to wide fine leg
131kph, cutter, shorter outside off, Pandya is deceived by the bounce trying to cut and he misses
cut over point! Staggering power! Short and wide, he leaned back and slapped a cut shot high over point and over the man on the rope!
115kph slower ball, he steps outside off but this is so wide it's outside the return crease but the umpire says he moved so he doesn't call it!
short ball, he pulls but mistimes it to deep midwicket
138kph, short and wide, he tries to uppercut but misses
crushed flat through cover-point! A length knuckleball but well wide he nailed this one forward of point and the man on the fence didn't even bother to chase
lofted straight! Just a check punch high and long and handsome! he sat back deep in the crease, got the length in the slot and he just played a check shot, and middled it.
bouncer but too high and rightly called wide
119kph, short slower ball outside off, he stands up and slaps this firmly to deep cover

top edge caught at short third man! Finch took the catch after taking the gamble. Brilliantly bowled from Zampa. He tossed it up with enough flight, dip and spin, Pandya tried to launch against the turn over long, got a top edge and it sliced to Finch at short third man who takes the catch easily
drilled straight of long off! 95kph, flatter on leg, he advances and drills a drive straight and beats long off coming across
99kph quicker on middle, he drives firmly to deep cover
92kph, wrong un, he misses trying to sweep. Well bowled
quicker short ball, he tries to pull and mistimes it, slicing it over the bowler but they opt not to take two! Kohli wants the strike
nearly bowled him! Kohli advanced, it deflect off the back pad and just missed leg stump, Wade had no chance to glove the deflection and it runs away

caught at deep backward point! Great catch by Sams! Full and wide, Kohli slices a square drive flat and low and it's dipping away from Sams as he runs forward, but he dives and takes it cleanly above the turf
117kph, slower ball, it dips on middle, he adjusts late and tucks it into the legside
141kph knee high full toss, he misses trying to thrash through point
141kph, higher full toss, not a no-ball though, he miscues safely to deep cover-point
119kph, slower ball on leg, he flicks this in the air but it lands short of deep backward square
flicked over backward square into the crowd! Length but in the slot! He set himself and used the bottom hand to lift it over deep square
lifted over cover off the back foot! What a shot! Length ball outside off, he was up on the toes and with a vertical bat lofted it over cover to the gap, one bounce four. Incredible stroke

caught at deep point! It would have been a wide if he didn't hit it! It was a thigh high full toss way wide of off, he reached out and got it off the toe, slicing it to deep backward point and Tye runs in and judges the catch well sliding on his knees
smoked over midwicket! Hold on! Knee high full toss on middle and he launched it over the long boundary at deep midwicket! Superb strike
119kph, short slower, he pulls in the air but it lands short of Tye at deep square and they only get two
swing and a miss. Excellent 117kph slower ball bouncer that beat him and stayed under head high
Sams drops a sky ball at deep midwicket! They get two but it's not enough. Another slower ball bouncer, he pulled it high to Sams at deep midwicket but he spills it. It matters not
